EmailTemplate.name: 201808_Global_Email_JetWave_WebCast_TM.201809_Global_MissedYou_JetWave_WebCast_m
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry We Missed You! Webcast - Experience the High-Speed Wi-Fi Advantage: Jet ConneX Powered by JetWave™
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> WE MISSED YOU Sorry we missed you, {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}}!
Since you couldn't make our webcast - Experience the High-Speed Wi-Fi Advantage: Jet ConneX Powered by JetWave™, here is the presentation slides <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/JetWave_101_r5_FINAL.pdf]]> and the recording <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/recording/play/mj-ofAgGAVnw6CAJjP82KZRFKA_psqqzOLcVjGQ8P3aMSt6Tm09BInZxtJb-qEZD?startTime=1536678097000]]> for you to review and share with your colleagues.
Stay in the loop with us and you’ll be among the first to learn about the next webinars, events, product launches and more!
YES, KEEP ME IN THE LOOP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]>
We look forward to seeing you next time!
Thank you,
Honeywell Aerospace
